synopsis: Nicolas, a photographer in his 20's, very suddenly loses his girlfriend to a car accident she was driving in. Still overcoming the loss, he takes up a sudden and unexpected affair with a girl he barely knows who is addicted to ecstasy. Their relationship slowly comes apart at the seams through sex, drugs, and harping on past mistakes.
casting: ['Thomas Wesson', 'Dasha Kittredge', 'Zack Abramowitz', 'Tali Custer', 'Matthew Rappaport', 'Alan Bendich', 'Suzanne Lynch', 'Erica Camarano', 'Kristy Richman', 'Jon Levy', 'Alex Valderana', 'Cyrenne Laljie', 'Adrian James Rosenaur', 'Jon Caballero', 'Andrew Birchenough', 'Matthew Catania', 'Kristin Allmer']

synopsis: At the end of the 50s, after assassinating the legendary capo Goncalves and dividing their domains, Ventura and Otálora, rival  and old friends, fight with their bands for the control of prostitution and contraband. Anabel, Ventura's favorite prostitute and her young lover, will live their passion among the violence that surrounds the port city.
casting: ['Eusebio Poncela', 'Marisa Paredes', 'Jorge Sanz', 'Héctor Alterio', 'Fernando Guillén', 'Nancho Novo', 'Alberto Alonso', 'Féodor Atkine', 'Cristina Marcos']

titre: L'Apprenti Père Noël et le flocon magique
synopsis: A young boy named Nicholas is about to become the next Santa Claus, but must first avoid a crisis that's threatening the magic of Christmas before he can succeed in his new role.
casting: ['Nathan Simony', 'Benoît Allemane', 'Évelyne Grandjean', 'Alexis Tomassian', 'Jean-Claude Donda', 'Vincent Grass', 'Mary Pat Gleason']

synopsis: Saban's Power Rangers follows five ordinary teens who must become something extraordinary when they learn that their small town of Angel Grove — and the world — is on the verge of being obliterated by an alien threat. Chosen by destiny, our heroes quickly discover they are the only ones who can save the planet. But to do so, they will have to overcome their real-life issues and before it’s too late, band together as the Power Rangers.
casting: ['Dacre Montgomery', 'Naomi Scott', 'RJ Cyler', 'Becky G', 'Ludi Lin', 'Bill Hader', 'Bryan Cranston', 'Elizabeth Banks', 'David Denman', 'Caroline Cave', 'Anjali Jay', 'Patrick Sabongui', 'Erica Cerra', 'Kayden Magnuson', 'Sarah Grey', 'Emily Maddison', 'Jaime M. Callica', 'Matt Shively', 'Garry Chalk', 'Fred Tatasciore', 'Jason David Frank', 'Amy Jo Johnson', 'Fiona Vroom', 'Lisa Berry', 'Morgan Taylor Campbell', 'Clayton James', 'Ranjit Samra']
